programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [Japanese Audio]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP63 A Trap for a Trap! [Japanese Audio]
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP64 Christmas at Tiffany's [English Dub]
programme.desc: Marguerite Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP65 Return of the X Factor [English Dub]
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP66 Beauty and the Deceased [English Dub]
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP63 Station Break-In
programme.desc: Discovering that the last two Chaos Emeralds are inside a Metarex fortress, Dr. Eggman suggests a truce between him and Sonic to work against their common foe.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP64 A Metarex Melee
programme.desc: Sonic faces off against Dark Oak once again, Eggman has taken control of Blue Typhoon and outside the fortress are Metarex armada led by Red Pine. The situation can't seem to get any more dire when Red Pine and his crew begin to attack their own base.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP65 Mission: Match up
programme.desc: As Amy wonders about fate of Shadow, the rest of the crew begin to fix things up around Blue Typhoon they come across a Chaotix ship who had been drifting in space since they last made their delivery to Chris.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP65 Mission: Match up
programme.desc: As Amy wonders about fate of Shadow, the rest of the crew begin to fix things up around Blue Typhoon they come across a Chaotix ship who had been drifting in space since they last made their delivery to Chris.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP66 Clash in the Cloister
programme.desc: Despite not knowing how it might affect Chris, the crew decide to travel through Intergalactic Cloister in hopes of reaching Metarex. The intense distortions inside the cloister knock everyone out inside the Cloister.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP67 Monkey King Business [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP68 Games of Chance [English Dub]
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP69 Zenigata Getcha Into My Life [English Dub]
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP70 Can't Beat the Classics [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 4: Hell Verse [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must travel into the depths of Hell to stop a group of vicious Sinners and save his younger sister Yuzu, unaware that his actions could bring Hell to the World of the Living.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: The Last Mission [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: The Battle Olympia begins! Gon and team attend, but The Shadow puts a deadly end to the festivities!

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E04 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E05 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E06 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress [English Subtitle]
programme.sub-title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress E04 [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: At a time when the industrial revolution was carrying the world into the modern age, a horde of undead monsters suddenly appeared. They could not be killed unless their hearts, which were protected by a layer of iron, were pierced. Humans bitten by them would come back as undead monsters themselves. These undead, which would later be known as "Kabane," exploded in population until they finally overran the world. - - The people of Hinomoto, a nation in the far east, built fortresses known as "stations" throughout the land that have allowed them to survive the threat of the Kabane. People can only travel between these stations using fortified steam locomotives known as "Hayajiro," and they have managed to stay alive by sharing resources in this way. - - Ikoma is a young steamsmith living at Aragane Station, a city that specializes in the manufacture of iron and steam engines. He is working on developing a unique anti-Kabane weapon called a "piercing gun" as he waits for his chance to prove his strength. - - Then, one day, a Hayajiro called the "Iron Fortress" makes its way through the front lines to arrive at Aragane Station. When Ikoma begins his usual maintenance routine, he sees a mysterious girl who is exempt from her Kabane inspection. That night, Ikoma sees the girl again and learns that her name is Mumei, but then an out-of-control Hayajiro overrun by Kabane charges into Aragane Station. - - The Kabane pour out of the train into Aragane Station. Ikoma races against the flow of the panicked residents, this time determined not to run away, but to defeat the Kabane with his piercing gun!

programme.sub-title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress E05 [English Subtitle]

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto, Sakura, and Kakashi team up with Rock Lee to escort Prince Michiru and his son Hikaru, but a villainous uprising awaits their homecoming.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: Terror in Resonance [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: Terror in Resonance E04 [English Dub]
programme.desc: Tokyo is suddenly hit by a massive bombing. - Two young men who call themselves “Sphinx” start an epic game involving the whole of Japan.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 4: Hell Verse [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must travel into the depths of Hell to stop a group of vicious Sinners and save his younger sister Yuzu, unaware that his actions could bring Hell to the World of the Living.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: The Last Mission [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: The Battle Olympia begins! Gon and team attend, but The Shadow puts a deadly end to the festivities!

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP67 Testing Time
programme.desc: Metarex have been following Blue Typhoon for 12 hours now. With no signs of attacks, Sonic begins to wonder if they are being led into a trap.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP68 A Revolutionary Tale
programme.desc: When Shadow destroys the fleet of Metarex and saves Molly inadvertently, him and Dr. Eggman are welcomed by the revolutionaries against Metarex. Attempting to capitalize on their gratitude, Dr. Eggman decides to take the planet's Chaos Emerald.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP69 The Planet of Misfortune
programme.desc: Sonic finds a meteor in space while on search for another Chaos Emerald. When Tails brings the meteor in, they discover it to be a space ship with small Chao-like creatures aboard.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP70 Terror on the Typhoon
programme.desc: Blue Typhoon attempts to save a small ship caught in the crossfire between them and the Metarex. Unfortunately, the pilot aboard the spaceship was Decoe, who was acting as a decoy to lure Sonic into the path of Megarex fleet led by Dr. Eggman.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP71 Dangerous Dreamers [English Dub]
programme.desc: Isami Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP72 You're Sapphired! [English Dub]
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP73 It's a Purloin-a-Palooza! [English Dub]
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP74 For Larva or Money [English Dub]
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!
